jx.jx_en_mean: so as to exclude something specified

lj.lj_ly: don't revise a few topics to the exclusion of all others.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin exclusio(n-), from excludere 'shut out' (see exclude)

entry.def: The exclusion of something is the act of deliberately not using, allowing, or considering it.

example.ex: It calls for the exclusion of all commercial lending institutions from the college loan program...
example.tran: 它提倡将所有商贷机构排除在高校贷款计划之外。
一些排除因素和限制条件比较适用。

entry.def: Exclusion is the act of preventing someone from entering a place or taking part in an activity.

example.tran: 在政治权力上对女性的排斥

example.ex: A spokeswoman for Mr Prescott yesterday made it clear that he had been unhappy at his exclusion.
example.tran: 普雷斯科特先生的发言人昨天表明他对于自己被拒绝十分不满。

entry.def: If you do one thing to the exclusion of something else, you only do the first thing and do not do the second thing at all.

example.ex: Diane had dedicated her life to caring for him to the exclusion of all else.
example.tran: 黛安娜一生都在照顾他，对其他一切都无暇顾及。

sentences.sentence: "with the exception of the children, everyone was told the news"

stems_affixes.word_buile: conclude[[v.结论;终结]]男→adj.决定性的;结论性的
exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→adj.排外的, 孤高的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclude[[v.排除,隔绝]]→n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物
occlude[[v.闭塞,堵塞]]男稳荽省鷑.闭塞,堵塞
preclude[[v.妨碍;阻止]]→n.排除, 阻止
con全部+clud关闭+e→全部关掉→结束
oc一再+clude=clud关闭→一再关起来不畅通→堵塞
pre预先,提前+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
se分开+clud关闭+e→分开关→隐居的

means.word_mean: 拒绝,排除,排斥,排除在外

sentences.en: He plays golf to the exclusion of all other sports.
sentences.cn: 他专打高尔夫球,其他运动一概不参加。

sentences.en: Don’t revise a few topics to the exclusion of all others.
sentences.cn: 不要修改少数论题以致排除所有其他的。

sentences.en: A 20-mile exclusion zone was set up around the power station to guard against further explosions.
sentences.cn: 发电厂周围设立了20 英里的禁区以減低再度爆炸造成的影响。
